marklogic.body:
Arizona is great when it's not Too hot. Â It's getting to be a little warm for me. Â Fortunately, the seats I got for Wednesday's game were in the shade. Â And so, it was perfect. I'm not familiar with Don and Charlies, Doc. Â We had brekkies/lunch at "Mango" on Main St., where the waiter warned us it was gonna be a hot one. After the game we heard the world's biggest "Mighty Wurlitzer Organ". Â That was my wife's choice and it was unique. Â I'll say that. Ran into lots of very nice folks in Mesa. Â I'm gonna try to get back there.
Speaking of places to go, Doc, yesterday we had a snack at Ruby's at the end of the pier in City. Â Saw a bunch of dolphins the end of the pier. Â I have never seen that in HB before. Â
Also saw a sea lion cavorting Off the pier, and some paintball aficionados on the beach. Â An interesting cultural mixture.Â
